text: “ ‘Omuntu yenna bw’anaakwatanga ku kintu ekitali kirongoofu, gamba omulambo gw’ensolo ey’omu nsiko etali nnongoofu, oba ku mulambo gw’ente etali nnongoofu, oba ku mirambo gy’ebiramu ebyekulula ebitali birongoofu, ne bw’anaabanga takitegedde, anaabanga afuuse atali mulongoofu, era anaabanga azzizza omusango.
